content: k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k1 rounds even twice work decrease round yo ssk ssk k2tog k2tog yo k1 yo k1 yo once knit 1 round even 3 times work k1 yo ssk ssk k2tog k2tog yo k1 yo k1 decrease round only until 22 sts remain use yo k1 ssk ssk slip marker k to end of kitchener st to graft toes round 35 instep sts/35 sole sts round 2 knit to first instep marker slip weave in all loose ends marker k2 p1 k8 p2 k9 p2 k8 p1 k2 sox on the beach copyright 2010 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may photocopy instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com charts sox on the beach copyright 2010 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may photocopy instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com
